entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
